item.description:
Host Claire P cell # 603-247-0897

Come and join us for a fun night of wild dancing to the great music of The Slackas (one of our favorite bands)playing tonight at Haluwa!
Haluwa is off exit 6w in Nashua in the Nashua Mall, just beyond Denny's & Radio Shack, but before Shortys. We'll start at 8, the band is at 9, til closing around 1!
We're probably going for the far corner of the club this time, where we can add tables as we add people thru the night. So don't be afraid to come late if you have to. We've had some big crowds there and the late comers keep us up to the end!
Dress is casual and there is no cover charge. Hoping to see you there!

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & dancing to The Slackas
